main event: Multiple sightings of glowing objects in triangular formation over Twin Falls, Idaho on 19 August 1947.
interesting points: The objects emitted a glow similar to that of electric lights., Several people reported seeing the objects traveling at very high speeds., Groups of objects were described, with some peeling off from larger formations., The sky was overcast during the sighting, which may have contributed to the visibility of the lights., Witnesses argued that the objects could not be birds due to the nature of their flight and illumination.
sighted object: glowing objects traveling in triangular formation
witness description: Several people reported the sighting of the objects.
